ifYouCloseAcsp: If you close the authorised agent, {BUSINESS_NAME} will no longer be registered as an authorised agent with Companies House. This is also known as an Authorised Corporate Service Provider (ACSP).
beforeYouContinueText1: If there are other people who work for the authorised agent, you must
beforeYouContinueLink: check if they’ve been added to the account
beforeYouContinueText2: You’ll need to tell them they will not be able to access the account, or use services for the authorised agent when you close it.
